long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Custom Robots.txt Generator for WordPress [Sitemap Generator for WordPress] is a powerful Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of generating custom robots.txt files for WordPress websites.

Robots txt is a crucial file that tells search engine crawlers which pages or sections of a website should be crawled or indexed, helping website owners control their site's visibility and ranking in search engine results.

✅ How to Generate Custom Robots.txt for WordPress using this Extension:
1. Install the Custom Robots.txt Generator for WordPress extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Click on the extension icon in the browser toolbar to open the popup.
3. Enter the URL of your WordPress blog in the provided input field.
4. Select the desired options, such as allowing/disallowing homepage and blocking specific bots.
5. Click the "Generate Robots.txt" button to generate the custom robots.txt file.
6. Copy the generated robots.txt content using the "Copy to Clipboard button".

✔️ How to Update Robots.txt of WordPress using Custom Robots.txt Generator for WordPress Extension:
1. After generating the custom robots.txt file using the extension, copy the generated content.
2. Log in to your WordPress.
3. Go to your SEO plugin.
4. Navigate to the "Crawlers and indexing" section.
5. Enable the "Custom robots.txt" toggle button.
6. Click on "Custom robots.txt" and Paste the copied robots.txt content into the provided text area.
7. After adding the code, click on "Save."

Custom Robots.txt Generator for WordPress [Free Sitemap Generator for WordPress] extension offers a user-friendly interface and advanced features to help WordPress users effectively manage their site's crawling and indexing directives. Improve your site's search engine visibility and SEO performance with ease using this handy extension!
